data.text: @SenatorTimScott @SenatorTimScott WHERE IS YOUR SUPPORT FOR THE SAVE AMERICA ACT?  If you are truly concerned about “disenfranchised voters” then establish a program to help the true citizens get an ID (50 total, maybe?) You help people expedite their Passports all the time. You can do this!!!

@SenatorTimScott Please and please, America senators should help poor Nigerian and urge the CBN Governor and Nigeria government to disburse the grant that is meant for the poor masses that is still pending in CBN for more than ten years now.....
@SenatorTimScott Trump has shown you all along what he is:  a lying, racist, sociopath/con-man and you supported him anyway!

@SenatorTimScott Trump made that racist post during black history month for a reason. It was to tell you and all people of color that we do not matter and you supporting him still is disgraceful and disrespectful to all minorities. You need to make a stand with where you stand!!!

@SenatorTimScott Voter id 

End sanctuary cities 

Eliminate the fraud of taxpayers money 

79 million voted for a mandate. Trump agenda 🇺🇸
@SenatorTimScott I say Amen to that.  The general consensus is that Tom Barrack is not the right person to be representing the United States and President Trump at this time.

@SenatorTimScott Some say Iran is“not our problem”
This is Islamic Republic:threatening U.S&world security,advancing its nuclear program,exploiting negotiations,funding Hamas,using civilians as shields.
Delay in action strengthens them
Support a democratic transition under @PahlaviReza leadership

@SenatorTimScott Have you announced your support for The SAVE America Act? 
Utilize the Standing Filibuster to pass it!
